document.full_text: india's supreme court declined to reduce the charges against seven men convicted of negligence for their roles in the 1984 leak at the union carbide chemical plant in bhopal.
document.title: asia: india: court stands by charges in bhopal leak
lines_and_colors: india's supreme court declined to reduce the charges against seven men convicted of negligence for their roles in the 1984 leak at the union carbide chemical plant in bhopal.
